attributes.comment:
I am writing to ask that you not increase the fee for the I-600A application. I am in
the process of adopting a child from China using World Child International. My
application was submitted in February of 2006. The waiting time for an adoption
from China was 7 months when I started the process, but has lengthened
considerably, likely reaching 24 months before our adoption is complete. Having
to reapply for the I-600A twice and even possibly three times represents a
financial hardship for my family. International adoption is extremely expensive.
Increasing the fees for waiting families represents an undue hardship.

Thank you for your consideration.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Kelley Nicholson-Flynn
